website_summaries.verdict: The racing in Little Big Planet Karting is enoyably off the wall, but a poor level editor tutorial saps some of the game's potential.
pros: Fantastic audio and visual presentationLengthy and varied story modeExtensive and powerful creation tools
cons: Poor tutorials make learning how to use the editor difficultWonky physics when karts collideWeapon usage slanted too far toward defense

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it!!!! My husband and I really like this game. It is a nice racing game with different planets/tracks to race on. The fact that while you race, you are searching for bubbles with treasures, is an added goal to achieve 100% completion on a level. We purchased a used copy, but it looked brand new and works wonderfully. We have now completed it and will probably start over. Very happy with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand other people's negative feelings towards this kart game. It runs smoothly, has a ton of costumes, imaginative tracks, great music, online functionality, the ability to create your own (and play others') tracks. The only complaints I have (compared to Modnation Racers) is that you can't fully build your own kart from scratch--but you still have plenty of options to create your own. I personally loved this game (and I've played nearly ever blue-shell-infested mario kart, as well as Modnation Racers and Sega & All Stars RAcing Transformed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storyline races, but really soars in network play!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been playing this kart game for a few days, but I love it. At first glance, it seems pretty simplistic. It's not so easy to guarantee a victory. The more you play, you find strategies that will put you ahead and, more importantly, keep you ahead of the other racers. I'm finding that, to obtain all of the treasures of the game, there's a lot of skill required, but the game doesn't force you through anything like that. Even on the harder "normal" setting, a few races should net you the luck to place in one of the upper levels and proceed with the story but, if you aim for perfection, you'll find the game very challenging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great game,
customer_reviews.text: Package says it's only for one player (and only has online multiplayer,) but it does offer a head-to-head mode, just turn on the second controller and another sackboy will appear. So that was a plus. Very similar to ModNation Racers, but with LBP elements and style. Which is fine with me because I love both games. BIGGEST BUMMER is that in your pop-up, they mix together the items you have with items for sale and it really clutters up customizing your car/sackboy. And you don't get all the costumes/items/stickers you earned in LBP1 and LBP2, which I sort of expected since LBP2 supported the LBP1 stuff.
customer_reviews.author: illnoise

customer_reviews.title: My kids love LBP games
customer_reviews.text: My kids now have all of the little big planet ps3 games. I think it is so neat that they can create levels and the game play is amazing. You can build your own carts and make costumes for your characters. Between all of the LBP games, you would never need another game. You cannot run out of things to do. Once you beat the game, there is still an unlimited amount of things to do. If you haven't already, check out the LBP games.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, simple, 2 can play offline
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter. Loves to play regular lbp with me. We were upset at first thinking only one player could join within the same ps3 but turns out you can have at least two on one ps3 and others can of course join in online but we don't use that part. She loves it so it's gets all stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: customer1735

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this game for my wife for Christmas and we have just had a ball with it ever since. The product got here quickly and was brand new in the package as described. To be honest, we haven't been able to put it down since she opened it. If you love LBP you will be stoked on this new edition, or if you are a PS3 junkie and are missing that "Mario Kart" aspect, this is the game for you. Very similar play style, but updated, streamlined, and "cutesy". Great game to play with that special someone or with family!
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft for Karting! but Better
customer_reviews.text: At first my kids could not understand what to do with the game. But after watching the tutorials build in the game, they spend hours building their own tracks, cars, and characters. Brings out the creative side in my kids. I also get involved and race them. We have a lot of fun. The best part is that the game is truly very customizable as to what you can do with it!
customer_reviews.author: Abu Aiza

customer_reviews.title: Proxy Review - From My teenage kids (girl and boy)
customer_reviews.text: As a parent, I am always glad when a toy or game gets played enough that I feel like I "got my money's worth." This can be a real crapshoot with video games, but I know my son and daughter both seem to really enjoy this game and have logged quite a few hours playing and designing courses. It also seems to be a game that crosses gender and age rather well. Good work by the designers and developers of Little Big Planet Karting!
customer_reviews.author: VT Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Play a game with your kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play with my 10 year old daughter. We love it. Easy enough for me (totally not a gamer) and fun for her to have Mom join her doing something she likes. My 4 year old nephew also had a great time playing and managed to win a few rounds too.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this game. Each time I turn it on I seem to be forced into the elementary process of "training" on the manner of applying gas, brakes, and how to steer, which is the basic methods of all games I have played. Nothing new here except I need to be retrained apparently each time I start up the game. I get so bored with it I turn it off and go to another game, ect. Maybe someday...
customer_reviews.author: Bang-for-the-buck

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. The kids have played it for years. My daughter is now 8 but even I and my 16 year old son sit down and play it all together! Recommended for ages 6-100!!
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent game and Amazon has twice listed it for $29.99, which is a steal for a family-friend multi-player game! My only complaints is that I do have 4 children and some of the story mode levels are 2-player only, which is a bit confusing for them and causes them to get into fights :) Otherwise, the # of courses and online levels makes this an excellent game that will stay fun for a longtime and not get stale like Mario Kart games.
customer_reviews.author: AntiochInteractive

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: Not the Little Big Planet your used to , but don't judge it based on that , play it for what it is a Karting game , its cute its fun its adorable is it Little Big Planet well not necessarily but the creating is there just in racing style . There is something missing and I cant quite tell what it is , not a bad game and for the price its not a loose at all , fun and entertaining .
customer_reviews.author: FunFact

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as fluid as classic karting games
customer_reviews.text: This game is still fun, dont get me wrong but it lacks that awesome and replay able feel that some karting games have aka Mario kart. For fans of the LBP series, no worries the awesomeness of playing a karting version of this series will make up for any deficiencies. I play this game with a group and it is good fun and everyone picks it up quickly as it plays like Mario with a few changes. It is a PS3 must have for fans of cartoony karting.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyede06

customer_reviews.title: My kids have enjoyed this game
customer_reviews.text: My kids have enjoyed this game. From what they have said it's a great game. I was surprised that it's only made for 1 player. I guess I missed that, which is ok. Usually games like this allow more players, which in turn allows friends and siblings to play too. I'm glad my kids also got the new Little Big Planet (#3) as they can all play together on that.
customer_reviews.author: Geohex

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, no issues with shipping or packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 11 year old son and his friends to play on down time. They like it but don't care too much as related to other carting games, their biggest complaint is that the control are difficult. Another review is that it needs more options for cart design and upgrade. Game arrived perfectly in tact and with out any damage at all and arrive on it expected date so again no issues, but just "ahhh" review from the kids. Had it a week and is ready to trade it. Great product for the price here on Amazon!!! do not pay full price for this game.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Little Big Planet Karting is still a lot of fun! I personally played through every race in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This game can't compare to Mario Kart, Mario Kart has been in the Biz for way longer. Little Big Planet Karting is still a lot of fun! I personally played through every race in the core game tried making a track of my own. There are few games on the PS3 that are perfectly designed for the under 15 crowd, but this is one of them!
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady Katie

customer_reviews.title: LittleBigPlanet Karting - Playstation 3 Review
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES Little Big Planet ANYTHING! I got her this and she hasn't grown tired of it yet! The little characters racing around in carts is cute and exciting. Well, I say if she loves it so do I! its nice, clean, video-gaming that offers challenges and creativity to all family members. Packaging was secure, pricing was right, and delivery was timely.
customer_reviews.author: Dwranny

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but...
customer_reviews.text: A nice and fun game, but the coop story mode can only be played with a max of 2 players, if you want to play a 4 player coop you need to complete the game first to unlock the tracks. An update is needed if you want to use your LBP and LBP2 costumes, and the game is a bit short for my taste, specialy if I compare it to MOD NATION. Dont get me Wrong i had fun with the game, but i felt the story mode was a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando J. Zurita G.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and they loved it. Lots of simple fun. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game.
customer_reviews.text: I Love This Series. I have the original LBP and the second so I had to get this one. Got it at a great price too. I'm giving it 4 stars and Sony is to blame. One of the best features about this series is the online play and all the additional user created worlds you can play in. There's always something new. In this game you have to enter a code to do that. They do include a code but if you don't have one it's an additional $10.
customer_reviews.author: E Hagensen

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: This is a good game. The courses in the game are varied and challenging, although I wish it had more levels. However, it has almost infinite community level which is great. The weapons are all really cool and you can customize your character as you would in LittleBigPlanet. The karts are also customizable and their is a lot of them to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Moises A. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Sackboy Goes Karting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as soon as I heard LittleBigPlanet was releasing another game in the series. I find the overall gameplay fairly similar to the other games in the series in terms of being pretty laid back with the exception that you are racing instead of jumping your way through a level. You still try to collect stickers and have customization abilities throughout the levels.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: meta mario kart
customer_reviews.text: to keep it simple, this game is unsurprisingly very fun if you like karting games. it has all the charm of a littlebigplanet game, the timeless formula of kart racing, and the wealth of content thanks to the "play create share" paradigm. so most likely none of that is very surprising. the important part is that community tracks are good; they range from very professional to mario kart track clones to weird, loopy, low-gravity tracks for goofing off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kyyro

customer_reviews.title: A quick Hit!
customer_reviews.text: We have LBP, LBP2, and LBP Karting. This is a much more "fast paced" game than LBP, but it is also much easier to "loot" levels. My oldest daughter and my wife like LBP Karting best. As with all LBP games... you can build, play, and share your own levels. If you don't like the levels that come with the game, simply make your own! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: M4tth3w

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. Kind of a meld of Diddy Kong Racing, Mario Kart and Crash Bandicoot Racing. I only wish there were more battle arenas and that battles didn't have time restrictions. Another con is that story mode can only be done with two people, which was kind of a shock after LBP & LBP2 were four player story. All around though it is a really fun game, and both the kart creation and sackboy creation are hysterical.
customer_reviews.author: The Newcombe's

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, did not receive game disc
customer_reviews.text: I have been so excited for this game, from what I've seen of it pre-purchase the levels look enticing and incredibly playful, with simple yet engaging gameplay and a killer soundtrack to boot! However, I did not receive the actual game disc in the mail, only the case.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Cart Racer
customer_reviews.text: I love the Little Big Planet series. This cart racer stands on it's own as a excellent racer with a high replay value. I like the various game modes including multi-player and online play, as well as race track creation mode. The various modes mentioned give this game endless possibilities. I recommend this game to fans of the series or those who are looking for a all around fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Little Big Planet Karting is the Playstation equivalent of Nintendo's "Mario Kart" games, but LBPK has more game modes to choose from, and it's perfect for those who are a fan of the regular Little Big Planet game series. LBPK is easy to pick up and play for even non-video gamers, and is fun multiplayer game at parties or other home gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Good fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Wish it had more of the features of little big planet. It's a little limiting, which is unfortunate, given how much you could do in LBP. The track builder is a little confusing, which is what made this 3 stars, since that's the big draw of this game. It's inexpensive now, so if you like fun wacky racing games, it's worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: yllawwally

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s kind of similar to Mario Kart, which I think is a good thing. There are a good variety of levels and items to unlock. Would be nice if there were more ‘battle’ items you can use and if the icons for each item were bigger and more distinguishable. Overall, if you like arcade type racers, this is a good pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Dr-Cog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived in pristine condition. No scratches or blemishes, and worked fine. Allows use of downloadable content from previous games. Fun for hours on end. Overall awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to play. The game is worth it if you are a little big planet fan or simply looking for easy to control racing games.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCat

customer_reviews.title: Tought it would be like other little big planet games but this one was ...
customer_reviews.text: Tought it would be like other little big planet games but this one was actually pretty dull and boring
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this game !! I have 4 nieces and nephews and being able to play a large group kid friendly game is so refreshing!!
customer_reviews.author: carson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome racing game w/ girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: My girl kept talking about kicking my butt in mario kart so I looked up some newer games and came across this, After reading some of the reviews I felt this would be perfect, So I bought it, for her i mean, lol. Great game, really fun, lots of different maps, and yes my girl does kick my butt in it every now and then... overall, great game and it was only 20$ so can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Game.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 7-8 year old daughter. She loves to build levels in the first two. This one she likes more of the racing aspect as the building isn't as open ended as the LBP games. At 38, I and the significant other still have fun playing with her. Cute animations, very cute characters, great game without murder, sex or magic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but get it on sale
customer_reviews.text: I never would have paid full price for this game. Since I found it on sale around Christmas time and my husband loves little big planet (and I like racing games) I bought it for him. We both played it and liked it, it's fun for what it is, but definitely not worth the full price. At $15, I felt it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NorthStar2130

customer_reviews.title: Love LittleBigPlanet Karting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my 6 yr old grandson to play on my ps3 when he's over. Turn's out i enjoyed it as much as him. I usually don't play games but this one i like.There's many different worlds to go so you don't get bored. Great family game. Craig
customer_reviews.author: Craig L. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Just Plain Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I like this video game! No gratuitous killing, no gore, no bad--- posturing. My wife and I really get into the racing action and share the emotional highs and lows of the charming sack boy. The graphics are captivating and imaginative, the story lines clever, the narration hysterical. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: David K. Aycock

customer_reviews.title: The next best thing to Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.text: No karting game will ever top Mario Kart. But this one easily comes the closest among all the subpar karting games out there. The LBP universe was a perfect choice for a good karting title.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: My 7yr old (and I) love this game
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old (and I) love this game. We play together all the time, so I'd say it's great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good game good deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game for the family. can play with up to 4 players. Kids love it and so do we. Bought this game thinking i could purchase the 6$$ dollar racing wheel for the move but found out that wheel was no good so we just use the duelshocks and they work good but it would probably be more fun with the wheel
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Little Bog Planet Karting
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter enjoys this movie but it too needs the extra parts to enjoy fully!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: For kids and Adults!
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the best most addictive game I have ever played. My friends are constantly calling me now to come and race. It's such a brilliant way to unwind after a tough work week, and my nephews love it too. I've slowly started building my own tracks as well, the controls and tutorials really make it very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mummycat

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the game it's wonderful my friends love it and I love you too ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the game it's wonderful my friends love it and I love you too I'm looking for to buy more games from guys
customer_reviews.author: kyle killian

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite karting game.
customer_reviews.text: Love the LBP series. Lots of things to unlock for the kids, fun levels, dificult opponents. I would recommend this game to parents looking for a game safe for kids to play. Good clean humor, nothing to even begin to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to say, new game & it works.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about my purchase, it arrived and was brand new. It works fine, a great game for the family, if you have kids they will love it it's really creative. I built my own track and published it so others can race on it, then GF made me stop playing so they could use it :(
customer_reviews.author: Ðarkness

customer_reviews.title: Fun and tons of Creativity in one little game
customer_reviews.text: Fun engaging game play for all ages. Great graphics. Original storyline. Lots of different options for changing things up all the time. My family loves this game. = }
customer_reviews.author: iHatePolyester

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty boring. The cars handle boringly. The stage creation is pretty limited, and yet overly complicated. Not enough customization options. Feels like a bad spinoff.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: LBP did it again
customer_reviews.text: Great platformer / karting game. It's an awesome addition to any family game night. The story line pick right up where LBP2 left off, and doesn't disappoint. I would have loved to see more puzzle-solving levels, but that might have been a bit too much.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A

customer_reviews.title: Gift for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4.5 year old boy and 8 year old daughter. Easy enough for the boy to play, and challenging enough for the girl to enjoy. It's no TOY STORY 3 for the PS3, which I think hands down is a game to own when looking for a game for young kids to tandem play on, but this one is enjoyable and the computer racers adjust to the level of driving ability of the players on the system.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Norris

customer_reviews.title: Too much
customer_reviews.text: Too much....just too much. Everything is overwhelming. The controls are nice...but within 5 minutes and a few races no one wanted to play again.
customer_reviews.author: robotconan

customer_reviews.title: what you see is what you get, Greatness
customer_reviews.text: nice presentation. Colors and graphics make me not want to purchase a ps4 yet with so many awesome games like this still out there.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A.

customer_reviews.title: Great racing game - better than MarioKart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I don't own a Wii anymore, but I grew up playing all of the Mario Kart racing games. Since I only have a PS3 now, I wanted to see what this was like. Not only is it comparable (easy to pick up if you've played Mario Kart), it has a LOT more levels, fun weapons, and great music with a diversity of things to do while racing. All around, a great buy for this type of game!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: LBP Freak
customer_reviews.text: My six year old is an LBP fan, he loves everything about the game. He would play them for hours and hours. He's actually spelling quite a lot because that's his only means of communication when playing online. He has to message via text
customer_reviews.author: Reddo1974

customer_reviews.title: LittleBigPlanet Karting - Playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my daughter, so she could play games on our new Play Station we bought for a family gift for Christmas. It is similar to Mario Carts, but it has differences. Still, I love it and so does she!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Lance

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the game. Great for couples -- bought it to play with my husband as I'm not a huge gamer but knew that LBP was cute. There are really only a few things that need to be done single player -- everything else can be co-op, and it's fun competing :)
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: If you like mario kart on the nintendo its little big planet meets that, but either way its great to play with friends, me and my gf bought 2 copies and have been playing it ever since. The servers are a little slow right now so it may take awhile longer to get some trophies but im sure its just a matter of time before they fix it, dont let that discourage you tho its a amazing game and would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: parker g

customer_reviews.title: need a karting 2
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. Not gonna lie it was sort of difficult and sort of redundant but still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A present for my adult daughter on her birthday
customer_reviews.text: We are all kids at heart, LOL and my daughter indicated to me that she was waiting for this to come out on the market. It came out just in time to purchase for her Birthday. She just loved it! Great price and super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: debra knipe

customer_reviews.title: Hails the Old While Bringing in the New.
customer_reviews.text: It's game keeps the feel of The Little Big Planet games previous while also appealing to a new audience. The creators of Little Big Planet hit a home run with this game. It has fantastic game play the variety of levels is great and it also has those charming elements and characters incorporated from the last game. I took it with me to my family Christmas and the adults as well as the children were fighting for a chance to play.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: very fun
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my wife so we can have something to play together like we used to and she adores it i tried getting her into the little big planet series but she only likes this one oh well at least we have fun together via video games
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas (who's not a gamer in any sense of the word) and she's played it almost non-stop since getting it. If buying it for a loved one, be prepared to give up your PS3 for at least a few days :)
customer_reviews.author: Azurko

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, continues with the dynamic and story lines of little big planet. Some tracks are very easy but some are very challenging (to get all the prizes). Love it! I am addicted to this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mónica florez

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I play this with my family and its an awesome game! its a shame it came out for free on Playstation Plus a few weeks after I bought it lol. But I thank sony for being such an amazing company!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great! a little different but still like it
customer_reviews.text: I loved little big planet 1 and 2 was super excited for Karting. A little different than regular little big planet but still customizable and that's whats good about it.
customer_reviews.author: SnazzyDre

customer_reviews.title: Good condition on arrival
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this game. Good condition on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: My boy said this was a very entertaining game. He and his friend played this quite a bit this summer, before going into 6th grade this year.
customer_reviews.author: Erik J. Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first, but can get boring after a while.
customer_reviews.text: This game gets boring really quick, but is fun to play with others. The back of the game case says that is only 1 player. This isn't true. You are able to play with 4 players offline.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is use to playing Mario Cart on the wii. She got a PS3 for Christmas this year along with this game. She loves it. Uses the Move Wheel with the regular controller in the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: denik

customer_reviews.title: What can I say
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves little big planet and this game has got her attention for the next month or so. It's easy to play and fun for a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: L. Odametey

customer_reviews.title: Steering wheel helps
customer_reviews.text: A little complicated for the kids but they have a good time with it. Steering wheel helps.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: My three kids, 6, 8, and 10, love this game, It takes a little while to get used to maneuvering the car in the right direction, but it is good fun and all my kids enjoy playing this game together.
customer_reviews.author: MCF

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Little Big Planet. I have 1,2, and PSP. I am looking foward for this one, but I hope the level creating isn't like Modnation Racers. I didn't really like that game so I hope it will be LBP's creat mode but in a 3D like way. I can only hope they change the online to 12 players atleast, not just 8! I'm probally going to get this for Christmas, not November. I'm really looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Amlap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game.. Do not buy used. Need code to get on line.
customer_reviews.author: jonney jay

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My twins love Little Big Planet and LBP 2. When we saw this we had to get it. It was delivered a day early. Our kids will be so happy when they open it on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Momma A

customer_reviews.title: LBP everything rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Once again the creators did a wonderful job. Pretty creative and fun game. Has replay value because you want to star all levels. Only downside is I haven't found online play to be all that great.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My two boys (6 and 9) are really enjoying this game. Some of it is easy for my 6 year old, and some parts are hard for my 9 year old. Good variety of different difficulties. :)
customer_reviews.author: R & K Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: This game is a ton of fun. We played & laughed for hours.
customer_reviews.text: This game is a ton of fun. We played & laughed for hours. It is a grown up version of Mario Cart Racing from Nintendo. If you are a Little Big Planet lover, you will really love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Krista girl

customer_reviews.title: little big planet
customer_reviews.text: Exclelent video game for child, in perfect condition and package, good presentation, you are excellent ideas, thanks for all, have a happy new year
customer_reviews.author: German Medina Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to Mario Kart. Great gameplay. Some levels are tough but you can fix this by lowering the skill level or whatever it is called. Online play is great to. You might have to change the brightness level on you tv becuase there is alot going on with many different colors. You can customize your carts and characters to the ninth degree!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon O Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6-year old and he loves it right out of the box. In addition to the excellent racing game play (though the controls are a bit fuzzy and not easy for him), he enjoys the decorating features and the terrain features. An excellent game all around.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Toczydlowski

customer_reviews.title: Need the steering wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed to find out on Christmas Day that we needed the steering wheel too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kid had a hard time finding the right remote to play this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Townsend

customer_reviews.title: LBP Karting
customer_reviews.text: move over Mario , here comes Sack boy.....Karting is fun
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: little big planet karting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my 10 year old son. He gets the biggest kick when playing it. He uses his imagination to design the characters. Waiting for the next Little Big Planet to come out!
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: I simply love this game
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this game, its alot like mario kart. If you don't own a wii of any kind and only have a ps3 then this is a perfect alternative.
customer_reviews.author: mp3burn591

customer_reviews.title: Kids are having a blast!
customer_reviews.text: They love this racing game and are constantly hogging the PS3 to play it! Though kid-friendly it's also great for adults to get involved.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: LBP Karting
customer_reviews.text: I've played all LBP games and I'm pleased with LBP Karting. It's a racing game but with all the magic of LBP. At the begginning, It seemed to me that it was like Mod Nation, but later I realized that it's different, much better, so fun. I recommend this game for who wants to play a full of fun game which can be shared with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Cruz

customer_reviews.title: but this one is my favorite because I can actually play this one
customer_reviews.text: The kids had the demo game &&always wanted the whole game. They have many Little Big Planet games, but this one is my favorite because I can actually play this one. Reminds me of Mario go carts racing game. love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LBP Karting
customer_reviews.text: kids love it. I just wish all levels were multiplayer. That's my only gripe
customer_reviews.author: TheBeastofMS

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! I play it with my boyfriend all the time! We love to play games that allow us to play at the same time! I also own LBP and LBP2 and love them both. I like being able to customize my character and vehicle. The tracks are challenging, fun, and addicting! Amazon was able to offer me the game at a great price! I do recommend this game!!! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: SiameseKitty

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves all of the Little Big Planet games, including this one. I love that it's creative, he can build his own characters and tracks. Thanks to the Little Big Planet games, he wants to be a game designer when he grows up.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: fun but
customer_reviews.text: Only one player can be on create mode at a time. Boys love little big planet, in create mode all of them can be on at same time. Not this one carting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too little
customer_reviews.text: The last two versions of this game have been a little too short by about two or three levels. And just making them incredibly difficult doesn't necessarily make a level more "fun." I think the developers need to go back to the first game play it a couple of times and then give us another iteration of this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Hull

customer_reviews.title: eh...
customer_reviews.text: We love Little Big Planet and Little Big Planet Two. This game was put together by a different group though... Neat game. Fun game. It just didn't hold a candle to the others.
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: LBP karting
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game to play with the boyfriend. Definitely suggest it if you're a lbp fan or if you like racing games. it goes a little quick though...
customer_reviews.author: AlyBee

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart.... but better
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun. It allows for multiple players and is very easy to learn its control system. The down side is that you cannot upload your information from previous games. This issue is only a temporary one though as the manufacturers are working to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: D Powell

product_meta.title: LittleBigPlanet Karting - Playstation 3
product_meta.description:
The Fastest LittleBigPlanet Ever 
Sackboy returns in a completely new adventure where your fast-paced karting will save the Craftworld universe. Get behind the steering wheel and get ready to race through fun-filled tracks, discover unlockables in open-world environments and battle in karting arenas filled with pick-up items and LittleBigPlanet-esque weaponry.

AMAZON.COM



 LittleBigPlanet Karting is a unique Racing game exclusive for PlayStation 3 that blends the "Play, Create, Share" standard set by earlier LittleBigPlanet games, with the addictive fun of classic kart racing. The game features a whole new adventure set in Sackboy's Craftworld universe, as well as extreme customization options for user generated content in the form of characters, tracks, mini-games and so on. Additional features include, the ability to share user generated content with the greater LBP community via PlayStation Network, compatibility with select 3D TVs, PlayStation Move compatibility and online and offline multiplayer support. 





Fast-paced kart racing action meets the extreme creativity of the LittleBigPlanet game franchise.
View larger 



Create tracks and games that incorporate platforming elements.
View larger 

FAST-PACED KARTING MEETS EXTREME LBP CREATIVITY
 Sackboy returns in a completely new adventure where players' fast-paced karting skills will be the key to saving the Craftworld universe. Get behind the steering wheel and get ready to race through fun-filled tracks, discover unlockables in open-world environments, and battle in karting arenas filled with pick-up items and LittleBigPlanet-esque weaponry in a karting game like no other. 

GAMEPLAY
 LittleBigPlanet Karting is a Kart Racing game that incorporates the familiar Platforming, and user generated content elements of the LittleBigPlanet universe, that sets the game apart from all kart racing games before it. The campaign of the game features a racing game mechanic in which players compete across tracks, with the goal of saving the Craftworld universe. The tracks of LittleBigPlanet Karting are filled with unique challenges, obstacles, mission objectives, boss battles and mini-games, which require much more than standard kart racing games. Along the way players gain access to a wide variety of weapons and power-ups that can be used increase their progress and/or impede that of opponents. 

 Along the lines of creativity, LittleBigPlanet Karting is also a true LittleBigPlanet game, firmly embracing the "Play, Create, Share" of the game series. Players can customize their Sackboy, as well as their karts, tracks and the rules to races. With this extreme freedom, races can be molded to be as constricted or open as the player chooses, and include as many obstacles, platforming challenges and mini-games as can be dreamt up. The game also incorporates familiar LBP grapple hook functionality, adding exciting platforming options to track/game design. Once tracks/games are created, they can be shared online through the PlayStation Network with other players in the LBP community. Multiplayer functionality includes four-player support in local play and support for up to eight players in multiple modes online via PlayStation Network. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * LittleBigPlanet Fun Takes to the Track - Your favorite customizable Sackboy returns with new driving abilities to guide you through a completely new fast-paced adventure.
 * 3D Compatible - Race through a whole new 3D world filled with a mix of familiar and unique Craftworld environments and themes. Experience competitive races, objective-based missions, boss battle challenges and the ever-competitive arena modes.
 * LittleBigPlanet Customization - In the creative mood? Customize your Sackboy and karts with tons of options unlocked throughout the game. And for all you future game designers, take control of the new Create tools and create your own tracks, missions, games and adventures, just like you did in all the other LittleBigPlanet games.
 * Interact with the LBP Community - Share your creations with the rest of the community and contribute to the inevitable thousands of new tracks and experiences created by fans just like you. 
 * Multiplayer - Share the fun in local multiplayer with up to three other players, or play online with up to seven additional kart racing friends.
 * PlayStation Move Compatibility - Optional PlayStation Move control system compatibility allows players to extend the creative, kart racing fun.

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS

Race through a whole new 3D world filled with a mix of familiar and unique Craftworld environments and themes. Experience competitive races, objective based missions, boss battle challenges and the ever competitive arena modes
Share your creations with the rest of the community and contribute to the inevitable thousands of new tracks and experiences created by fans just like you

In the creative mood? Customize your Sackboy and Karts with tons of options unlocked throughout the game. And for all you future game designers, take control of the new CREATE tools and create your own tracks, missions, games and adventures, just like you did in all the other LittleBigPlanet games
Compatible with PS Move controllers (but only when used with PS Move Racing Wheels)
Your favorite customizable Sackboy returns with new driving abilities to guide you through a completely new fast-paced adventure.

Race through a whole new 3D world filled with a mix of familiar and unique Craftworld environments and themes. Experience competitive races, objective-based missions, boss battle challenges and the ever-competitive arena modes.

In the creative mood? Customize your Sackboy and Karts with tons of options unlocked throughout the game. And for all you future game designers, take control of the new CREATE tools and create your own tracks, missions, games and adventures, just like you did in all the other LittleBigPlanet games.
Share your creations with the rest of the community and contribute to the inevitable thousands of new tracks and experiences created by fans just like you.
